item.help: call – Place an audio or video call. chat – Initiate/restart a chat. dropdown – Dynamically choose whether to place a call or initiate/restart a chat.
item.name: name

item.help: A skype name(phone number) or a list of Skype Names (or phone numbers) formatted as a comma-separated list.
item.name: participants

item.help: The optional topic string for a conference call, group video chat, or multichat.Ignored if there are fewer than two participants.
item.name: topic

item.help: Which text color variant of the image asset to use, depending on your webpage’s background.
item.name: imageColor

item.help: Which size of the image asset to use
item.name: imageSize

item.help: Whether this is a video call.Ignored if this Skype button type is not an explicit call or dropdown;
item.name: video
